Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BsaA2 (Bacteriocin of S. aureus A2; staphylococcin Au-26; natural AMPs; lantibiotics, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes;  UCSS1b; XXT4; XXW3)
Sequence Information.Source: community-acquired methicillin-resistantS. aureus; Staphylococcus aureus strain 26

Literature Information.Literature: This bacteriocin is identical to staphylococcin Au-26 initially reported in 1992 (Scott JC et al., 1992). Found in multiple species. It is proposed that BsaA2 has a similar structure to epidermin. Thioether bonds between residues 3 and 7, 8-11, 16-21, and 19-22.

Literature Information.Title: Production of the Bsa lantibiotic by community-acquired Staphylococcus aureus strains.
